champ_0260_system_01:
Are you ready to face the final test of the
Champion Assessment?
champ_0260_chairman_02:
It gives me great joy that you’ve managed to
make it all the way to the pinnacle of the\r
Pokémon League.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0260_chairman_03:
The final test is a battle against me, the Top
Champion.\c
To pass, all you need to do...is win.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0260_chairman_04:
But before we get started, I should apologize
for one thing.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0260_chairman_05:
You see, I have a trait that some might say is
inappropriate for the League Chairwoman...[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0260_chairman_06:
I am utterly incapable of holding back when it
comes to Pokémon battles.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0260_chairman_07:
Maybe that’s why nobody’s passed this test
recently. It’s a bit of a problem, to be honest.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0260_chairman_08:
But you... You might manage something
wonderful, like Champion Nemona did.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0260_chairman_09: So, are you ready for your final test?[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0260_chairman_10: I want to see the true measure of your talent![VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0260_chairman_11: Such overwhelming power... Such amazing skill...[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0260_chairman_12:
It seems Paldea has gained another wonderful
Trainer to be proud of.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0260_chairman_13:
Congratulations. It’s my honor to call you
Champion [VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0260_ground_01:
“Congratulations” is right! Now I can really say
you’re good to go![VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0260_dragon_01:
J-j-just ABAAAZIIING! I gan’t...I GAN’T HOLD
ID IN ANYBOOORE![VAR 0114(0012)]
champ_0260_chairman_14: You Pokémon Trainers are the treasure of Paldea.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0260_chairman_15:
And amid that treasure, Champions are the
jewels that shine brightest.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0260_chairman_17:
It is now your duty to set an example for all of
the Trainers of Paldea.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0260_chairman_18: Now, allow me to walk you back to the entrance.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0260_chairman_19:
I’m certain you’ll find a familiar face
awaiting you.[VAR 0114(0011)]
